headline.main: Identity of Private Who Warned That Foe Was Approaching Pearl Harbor Revealed

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Feb. 1 -- Private Joseph L. Lockard, 20, of Williamsport, Pa., was the soldier who detected Japanese planes approaching Pearl Harbor while he was practicing at the listening device the morning of Dec. 7 only to have his warning disregarded, Representative Harness of Indiana reported tonight.
abstract: Soldier who detected Jap planes approach to Pearl Harbor revealed as J L Lockard; citation urged by U S Repr Harness
